cta_message: Whether you're a collector or just curious, LibraMédia invites you to explore a world where every object tells a story.
categories_description_all: Discover our wide range of products, including rare books, exceptional vinyl records, and unique accessories.
categories_description_specific: Explore our collection of {{category}}, carefully selected to meet all your expectations.
no_products: No products found in this category.
footer_about_description: LibraMédia is your ideal marketplace to discover unique books, vinyls, and accessories. We emphasize culture and quality at the heart of our products.

about_us.title: Welcome to LibraMédia!
about_us.intro: At LibraMédia, we share a common passion: offering a unique space where culture enthusiasts can discover, sell, and buy precious treasures in the form of books, vinyls, and CDs. Whether you're looking for a rare piece, a timeless classic, or a novelty, our marketplace is made for you.
about_us.mission_text: Our mission is to connect reading and music enthusiasts while giving new life to cultural objects. We believe every book, vinyl, and CD tells a story and deserves to be shared, loved, and passed on to new enthusiasts.

offer_items.sell_buy_space: A Selling and Buying Space: Whether you want to sell a collection or find a specific item, our platform simplifies every step.
offer_items.community: A Community of Enthusiasts: Join a vibrant community of culture lovers who share your interests.
offer_items.diverse_categories: Diverse Categories: Books, vinyls, and CDs, with special attention to rare and quality products.

about_us.join_us_text: Whether you're an avid collector, a music lover, or a devoted reader, LibraMédia is your destination to find, sell, and share what you love. Together, let's bring culture to life and create a marketplace where every object has a story to tell.
about_us.thank_you: Thank you for being part of our journey and welcome to the LibraMédia community!
